title: Simulation-Based Medical Education Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and clinical environment comprehension
context.additional_context: Blended educational environment combining face-to-face simulation practice with online theoretical learning.

learning_goals: Learners can apply patient safety protocols with 90% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Learners can solve team-based clinical problems through the use of simulation equipment and debriefing techniques.
Learners can analyze peers' performance in three or more dimensions using simulation assessment tools.

resources: Medical simulation equipment (virtual patient simulator, manikin)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
